title: Volume 18, Number 4
summary: The newsletter discusses key legal updates including an extension of OPMA prohibitions, federal grant management under 2 CFR and state law (public duty doctrine), and public health declarations.
compressed_content: Extension of OPMA Prohibitions: The order lifting in-person meetings remains valid. Federal Grant Management: Key regulations under 2 CFR ยง 200.302 apply, requiring tracking allowable costs and proper documentation. Public Duty Doctrine: The public duty doctrine applies to certain interactions with the public, as held by the court in Ehrhart v. King County.
search_text: Open Public Meetings Act Federal Grants Public Duty Doctrine Beltran-Serrano case 2 CFR ยง 200.302 RCW 52.16.020
